bill_title: revise certain provisions regarding the issuance of noncommercial motor vehicle license plates.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise certain provisions regarding the issuance of noncommercial motor vehicle license plates. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 32-5 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any applicant for number plates authorized by § 32-5-82 may request, at the time of registration, the county designator number that the applicant wishes to appear as part of the distinctive number on the plates as provided by § 32-5-84. The county treasurer shall forward the request to the department. The department shall mail the applicant the numbered plates as requested by the applicant. If any applicant makes a request pursuant to this section, the applicant shall pay the actual costs of any postage. The county treasurer shall collect the postage at the time of registration. Any postage collected pursuant to this section shall be deposited in the state motor vehicle fund. 300 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.029 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
